name: relogefd

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, c0)), c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: Relationship between the natural logarithm function and the exponential function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
